85803.name: Gini coefficient, equivalized income after tax and transfers
85803.description: Whilst most of these figures refer to disposable household income, for some countries the unit of analysis is different (e.g. family)
85803.datasetName: Gini Coefficient, Equivalized Income After Tax and Transfers – Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017)

source.name: Atkinson, Hasell, Morelli, and Roser (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Atkinson, Hasell, Morelli, and Roser (2017), “The Chartbook of Economic Inequality"
